verses.verse: How is the gold <S%H2091><s%> become dim <S%H6004><s%>! how is the most <S%H2896><s%> fine gold <S%H3800><s%> changed <S%H8132><s%>! the stones <S%H68><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> are poured out <S%H8210><s%> in the top <S%H7218><s%> of every street <S%H2351><s%>.

The precious <S%H3368><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>, comparable <S%H5537><s%> to fine gold <S%H6337><s%>, how are they esteemed <S%H2803><s%> as earthen <S%H2789><s%> pitchers <S%H5035><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the potter <S%H3335><s%>!

Even the sea monsters <S%H8577><s%> draw out <S%H2502><s%> the breast <S%H7699><s%>, they give suck <S%H3243><s%> to their young ones <S%H1482><s%>: the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> is become cruel <S%H393><s%>, like the ostriches <S%H3283><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

The tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the sucking child <S%H3243><s%> cleaveth <S%H1692><s%> to the roof of his mouth <S%H2441><s%> for thirst <S%H6772><s%>: the young children <S%H5768><s%> ask <S%H7592><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, and no man breaketh <S%H6566><s%> it unto them.

They that did feed <S%H398><s%> delicately <S%H4574><s%> are desolate <S%H8074><s%> in the streets <S%H2351><s%>: they that were brought up <S%H539><s%> in scarlet <S%H8438><s%> embrace <S%H2263><s%> dunghills <S%H830><s%>.

For the punishment of the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> is greater <S%H1431><s%> than the punishment <S%H2403><s%> of the sin of Sodom <S%H5467><s%>, that was overthrown <S%H2015><s%> as in a moment <S%H7281><s%>, and no hands <S%H3027><s%> stayed <S%H2342><s%> on her.

Her Nazarites <S%H5139><s%> were purer <S%H2141><s%> than snow <S%H7950><s%>, they were whiter <S%H6705><s%> than milk <S%H2461><s%>, they were more ruddy <S%H119><s%> in body <S%H6106><s%> than rubies <S%H6443><s%>, their polishing <S%H1508><s%> was of sapphire <S%H5601><s%>:

Their visage <S%H8389><s%> is blacker <S%H2821><s%> than a coal <S%H7815><s%>; they are not known <S%H5234><s%> in the streets <S%H2351><s%>: their skin <S%H5785><s%> cleaveth <S%H6821><s%> to their bones <S%H6106><s%>; it is withered <S%H3001><s%>, it is become like a stick <S%H6086><s%>.

They that be slain <S%H2491><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%> are better <S%H2896><s%> than they that be slain <S%H2491><s%> with hunger <S%H7458><s%>: for these <S%H1992><s%> pine away <S%H2100><s%>, stricken <S%H1856><s%> through for want of the fruits <S%H8570><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>.

The hands <S%H3027><s%> of the pitiful <S%H7362><s%> women <S%H802><s%> have sodden <S%H1310><s%> their own children <S%H3206><s%>: they were their meat <S%H1262><s%> in the destruction <S%H7667><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath accomplished <S%H3615><s%> his fury <S%H2534><s%>; he hath poured out <S%H8210><s%> his fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%>, and hath kindled <S%H3341><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and it hath devoured <S%H398><s%> the foundations <S%H3247><s%> thereof.

The kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%>, would not have believed <S%H539><s%> that the adversary <S%H6862><s%> and the enemy <S%H341><s%> should have entered <S%H935><s%> into the gates <S%H8179><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

¶ For the sins <S%H2403><s%> of her prophets <S%H5030><s%>, and the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of her priests <S%H3548><s%>, that have shed <S%H8210><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the just <S%H6662><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of her,

They have wandered <S%H5128><s%> as blind <S%H5787><s%> men in the streets <S%H2351><s%>, they have polluted <S%H1351><s%> themselves with blood <S%H1818><s%>, so that men could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> touch <S%H5060><s%> their garments <S%H3830><s%>.

They cried <S%H7121><s%> unto them, Depart <S%H5493><s%> ye; it is unclean <S%H2931><s%>; depart <S%H5493><s%>, depart <S%H5493><s%>, touch <S%H5060><s%> not: when they fled away <S%H5132><s%> and wandered <S%H5128><s%>, they said <S%H559><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, They shall no more <S%H3254><s%> sojourn <S%H1481><s%> there.

The anger <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath divided <S%H2505><s%> them; he will no more <S%H3254><s%> regard <S%H5027><s%> them: they respected <S%H5375><s%> not the persons <S%H6440><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%>, they favoured <S%H2603><s%> not the elders <S%H2205><s%>.

As for us, our eyes <S%H5869><s%> as yet failed <S%H3615><s%> for our vain <S%H1892><s%> help <S%H5833><s%>: in our watching <S%H6836><s%> we have watched <S%H6822><s%> for a nation <S%H1471><s%> that could not save <S%H3467><s%> us.

They hunt <S%H6679><s%> our steps <S%H6806><s%>, that we cannot go <S%H3212><s%> in our streets <S%H7339><s%>: our end <S%H7093><s%> is near <S%H7126><s%>, our days <S%H3117><s%> are fulfilled <S%H4390><s%>; for our end <S%H7093><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>.

Our persecutors <S%H7291><s%> are swifter <S%H7031><s%> than the eagles <S%H5404><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%>: they pursued <S%H1814><s%> us upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, they laid wait <S%H693><s%> for us in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

The breath <S%H7307><s%> of our nostrils <S%H639><s%>, the anointed <S%H4899><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, was taken <S%H3920><s%> in their pits <S%H7825><s%>, of whom we said <S%H559><s%>, Under his shadow <S%H6738><s%> we shall live <S%H2421><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>.

¶ Rejoice <S%H7797><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>, that dwellest <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Uz <S%H5780><s%>; the cup <S%H3563><s%> also shall pass <S%H5674><s%> through unto thee: thou shalt be drunken <S%H7937><s%>, and shalt make thyself naked <S%H6168><s%>.

¶ The punishment of thine iniquity <S%H5771><s%> is accomplished <S%H8552><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>; he will no more <S%H3254><s%> carry thee away into captivity <S%H1540><s%>: he will visit <S%H6485><s%> thine iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>; he will discover <S%H1540><s%> thy sins <S%H2403><s%>.
